title: How effective was Stuka in Western Front? - Quora

response.answer_text: When it was used in the situation it was designed to operate in it was very effective, when used outside those situations it was just a target It was designed to act as “Airbourne Artillery” for advancing mechanised troops always within an setting of air superiority When it used used without air superiority its losses were horrendous which is why they were withdrawn from the Battle of Britain
